colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA DBYUG GU DRUG BCU RTZA BZHI'I GROR MA PHUL TE ZHI BA'I 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL 'DUN LDAN RE BSKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU LHA BTZUN BKA' BCU SANGS RGYAS RGYAN MTSAN GYIS SNGA MO NAS BSKUL ZHING, NYE CHAR BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MCHOG SPRUL BI SHRIL THU ME RGEN PAndI TA MKHAN PO NYID NAS, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' GNANG BA LTAR ^CHING BI SHREL THU YO GA TZRYA PAndI TA DZNY'A NA BHA DRAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
